selection.name: Big Grove Easy Eddy
selection.description: A double dry-hopped hazy IPA with tropical flavors of pineapple and mango, a round body, and soft bitterness.

selection.name: Golden Road Mango Cart
selection.description: A craft wheat ale made with real mango, inspired by fruit cart vendors of Los Angeles. Light-bodied with a crisp finish.

selection.name: Kona Big Wave
selection.description: A golden ale from Hawaii with a lighter body, bright hop aroma, mild hop flavors, and a touch of caramel malt.

selection.name: Take 16 Country Mile
selection.description: A German-style Kölsch brewed in Luverne, MN, known for its clean, crisp, and slightly fruity flavor.

selection.name: Loon Juice Extra Juicy
selection.description: A sweet hard cider made from Honeycrisp apples with bright, fruity apple character.

selection.name: Busch Light
selection.description: An American light lager with a smooth, crisp taste, light malt sweetness, and mild hop bitterness.

selection.name: Michelob Ultra ('Ultra')
selection.description: A light lager brewed with pale malts and rice, known for its crisp, subtle flavor and light golden color.

selection.name: Grain Belt Nordeast
selection.description: An amber American lager with full flavor, brewed by August Schell Brewing Company. Amber in color, it was named after the Northeast Minneapolis neighborhood.

selection.name: Bauhaus Varieties
selection.description: A range of German-inspired, flavor-forward, and sessionable beers from Bauhaus Brew Labs, often lighter lagers or ales with a unique twist.

selection.name: Bent Paddle Retro Varieties
selection.description: A series from Bent Paddle Brewing, including Retro Haze—a hazy pale ale—and other classic-style beers brewed in Duluth, MN.

selection.name: Wild State
selection.description: Natural craft cider from Minnesota, made without added sugar, artificial flavors, or concentrates. Wild State focuses on clean, crisp, and natural cider flavors.

selection.name: Surly Furious
selection.description: An American IPA with aggressive hop character, notes of citrus, and a caramel malt backbone. Amber in color, known for its bold bitterness.

selection.name: Mosh Pit Hazy
selection.description: A hazy IPA from Surly Brewing, featuring a tropical fruit hop bouquet with notes of pineapple, and a juicy, hazy profile.
